item.p: The quote element can contain a mixture of text and any general inline elements.
The quote element can occur in any general inline context, including inside most inline elements, some basic block elements, and certain informational elements.
The quote element can link to other pages or documents. See for more information.
The style attribute takes a space-separated list of style hints. Processing tools should adjust their behavior according to those style hints they understand.
The quote element can have attributes from external namespaces. See for more information on external-namespace attributes.
